# Grenish Rai - Full Stack Developer Portfolio

## Complete Site Information

### Personal Information
- **Name**: Grenish Rai
- **Title**: Full Stack Developer
- **Education**: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) from Sikkim Manipal Institute of Technology (SMIT)
- **Location**: Based in India
- **Specialization**: Modern web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and backend technologies. Also interested in AI/ML and creative writing.
- **Availability**: Open for freelance projects.

### Contact & Social Links
- **Email**: mrcoder2033d@gmail.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/grenish
- **LinkedIn**: https://linkedin.com/in/grenish-rai
- **Twitter**: https://twitter.com/grenish_rai
- **Portfolio**: https://grenishrai.dev
- **Support**: https://buymeacoffee.com/grenish

### Website Structure & Pages

#### Homepage (/)
- **Hero Section**: Introduction.
- **About Section**: Details professional background, skills, and current projects like 'Authrix'.
- **Projects Section**: A showcase of 4 key projects with descriptions and links.
- **Hackathon Timeline**: An interactive timeline of 2 major hackathon participations.
- **Daily.dev Squad**: A community engagement section.

#### Blog Section (/blogs)
- **Integration**: Fetches articles from Dev.to API for the username 'grenishrai'.
- **Features**: Articles are grouped by year, show reading time, view count, and tags.
- **Content**: Technical articles and tutorials.

#### Contact Page (/contact)
- Provides a way to get in touch and lists social media links.

### Technical Implementation

#### Frontend Technologies
- **Framework**: Next.js 15.3.1 with App Router
- **UI Library**: React 19
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Animations**: GSAP
- **Fonts**: Montserrat
- **Markdown**: `react-markdown` for rendering blog content.

#### Key Features
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach.
- **Dark Theme**: Consistent dark theme (`bg-gray-900`, `bg-gray-950`).
- **Dynamic Content**: Blog posts are fetched dynamically from the Dev.to API.
- **Interactive Elements**: Modal popups for hackathon details, hover effects on projects.
- **SEO Optimization**: Metadata defined in `layout.tsx`.

#### Component Architecture
- **Navbar**: Adaptive navigation.
- **Hero**: Landing section.
- **About**: Professional summary and technology stack.
- **Projects**: Interactive project list.
- **HackathonTimeline**: Timeline with modal for details.
- **Footer**: Contains navigation and social links.
- **MarkdownRenderer**: (Used in blog pages) for rendering markdown.

### Project Portfolio

#### Featured Projects
1.  **Authrix**: An enterprise-grade authentication library for JavaScript. (NPM Package)
2.  **Detoxify**: A browser extension to hide YouTube Shorts. (SaaS Product)
3.  **Make Sam Happy**: An interactive AI-driven game. (AI/ML)
4.  **Valorant API**: An unofficial open-source API for Valorant game data. (Data Visualization)

#### Hackathon Achievements
- **Smart India Hackathon (2023)**: Presented an AI model for dermatological disease detection.
- **Dark Pattern Buster Hackathon (2023)**: Runner-up for a browser extension to detect deceptive UI/UX.

### Content Strategy

#### Blog Topics
- Web development tutorials
- React and Next.js
- Full stack development
- AI/ML
- Open source projects

#### SEO Keywords
- Grenish Rai, Portfolio, Full Stack Developer, React, Next.js, SMIT, TypeScript, AI/ML

### Development Setup

#### Build System
- **Package Manager**: Bun
- **Development Script**: `next dev --turbopack`
- **Build Script**: `next build`
- **Linting**: `next lint` (ESLint)
- **TypeScript**: Strict type checking enabled.

### API Integration

#### Dev.to Integration
- **Endpoint**: `https://dev.to/api/articles?username=grenishrai`
- **Authentication**: Uses `DEVTO_API_KEY` from environment variables.
- **Caching**: Revalidates every 3600 seconds (`revalidate: 3600`).
